Argh! Saved this on a Mac and the extension changed to .MOV. It's really an MP4 so if you're having trouble opening it with your media player of choice, just change the extension to .MP4 and you should be good.
The band is Irish Moutarde. Song is here: http://www.irishmoutarde.com/fr/music/bearCDS.php
